Title: 856: The Fastest-Growing Jobs Are AI Jobs
Description:
Get excited: The fastest-growing jobs in the US are AI Engineer and AI Consultant. In this Five-Minute Friday, Jon Krohn looks into the reports that reveal this job growth, and the trends any data scientist and AI professional will want to watch in 2025.


Additional materials: www.superdatascience.com/856
